languages.text: {n}Едкий дым вползает в ноздри серыми змейками, и реальность становится похожей на вату. Мысли формируются нехотя, перетекая из одной в другую и смешиваясь в причудливый калейдоскоп образов.{/n}
{n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Едкий дым вползает в ноздри серыми змейками, и реальность становится похожей на вату. Мысли формируются нехотя, перетекая из одной в другую и смешиваясь в причудливый калейдоскоп образов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The grey serpents of caustic smoke crawl into your nostrils, at which point reality becomes as wadding. Your thoughts form reluctantly, spilling from one into another, joining in a whimsical kaleidoscope of imagery.{/n}

{n}The grey serpents of caustic smoke crawl into your nostrils, at which point reality becomes as wadding. Your thoughts form reluctantly, spilling from one into another, joining in a whimsical kaleidoscope of imagery.{/n}
{n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}

{n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des volutes serpentines de fumée grise et caustique se glissent dans vos narines jusqu'à ce que la réalité se brouille. Vos pensées ralentissent et se mêlent les unes aux autres pour former un étrange kaléidoscope d'images mentales.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des volutes serpentines de fumée grise et caustique se glissent dans vos narines jusqu'à ce que la réalité se brouille. Vos pensées ralentissent et se mêlent les unes aux autres pour former un étrange kaléidoscope d'images mentales.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unas sierpes grises de humo cáustico se deslizan hacia tu nariz hasta que la realidad se vuelve borrosa. Tus pensamientos se vuelven lentos y perezosos, y se unen en un caleidoscopio aberrante de imágenes mentales.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unas sierpes grises de humo cáustico se deslizan hacia tu nariz hasta que la realidad se vuelve borrosa. Tus pensamientos se vuelven lentos y perezosos, y se unen en un caleidoscopio aberrante de imágenes mentales.{/n}

languages.text: {n}腐蚀性的烟雾仿佛变成了一条灰蛇，滑入你的鼻腔，周围的一切都变得模糊起来。你的思维变得缓慢、迟滞，所有的一切都融合在一起，变成了光怪陆离的万花筒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}腐蚀性的烟雾仿佛变成了一条灰蛇，滑入你的鼻腔，周围的一切都变得模糊起来。你的思维变得缓慢、迟滞，所有的一切都融合在一起，变成了光怪陆离的万花筒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}灰色の蛇のような苛烈な煙が鼻孔に入り込み、周囲がぼんやりとしてきた。思考はだんだん鈍っていき、奇妙な万華鏡のような心象風景へと融合していく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}灰色の蛇のような苛烈な煙が鼻孔に入り込み、周囲がぼんやりとしてきた。思考はだんだん鈍っていき、奇妙な万華鏡のような心象風景へと融合していく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Graue, beißende Rauchschwaden kriechen in deine Nase, bis die Realität völlig verschwimmt. Deine Gedanken werden langsam und träge, verschmelzen zu einem bizarren Kaleidoskop mentaler Bilder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gri dumandan gelen yakıcı kokuların burun deliklerine akmasıyla gerçeklik bulanıklaşmaya başlıyor. Düşüncelerin yavaşlıyor ve tembelleşiyor, bir araya gelip zihinsel imgelerden oluşan tuhaf bir kaleydoskop oluşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grey serpents of caustic smoke slither into your nostrils until reality becomes a blur. Your thoughts grow slow and sluggish, merging together into a bizarre kaleidoscope of mental imagery.{/n}
